column5: i was thinking the same thing ...i dont know whats bigger ...the fish ...or the smile!!!!  Nice shootin!!!!!
No its not a 50+ but im working on it    Got this 44 incher on a bulldog.    Hope everyone is having a great summer fishin!
hey congrats, nice one!
Yup, thats a good Muskie!
NICE!!!!
Your smile says it all....very nice fish! Hope to see you hoisting that 50 incher soon.
Solid fish!!!  Congrats on the PB
Congrats on a beautiful Musky.  Nice & Thick.  Thanks for Sharing
hmmmm..... that fish loooks soooo much BIGGER than the bass I am targeting lately
6 more inches ain't all that much.  You're just warming up now - now go get the 50.  Congrats on the PB
Good looking fish

Beauty! Kawarthas fish? Nice and thick. Can I ask if you were trolling or casting the bulldawg? I have so far caught zilch on mine, and have no confidence in it at the moment despite the fact that it looks oh-so tasty in the water.
I seriously doubt that is a Kawarthas fish Pete.
Nice gator    Congrats on your PB

Thanks! It was nice and thick with a 21" girth!  Not a Kawarthas fish either I should add.  I was casting the bulldawg, it was my first muskie to hit away from the boat.  I was fishing it with a constant retrieve most of the day but after not getting a sniff I decided to change it up.  Within 20 casts of changing my retrieve I got it. The key was using long sweeps on the rod and letting the bait fall for a second.
Nice... I will try that on my next trip.
wow great fish!!!  Cheers!
Nice Ski. That looks like a GB ski(more than likely Lake O, since you live in Kingston). Bulldogs are great lures, and are especially effective as a follow up lure, or a figure 8 lure.
greasy fish davey, lets get at er in a weeks time
nice fish  Man you look like you could be related to Mikethebassfisher
VERY NICE FISH DUDE! GratZ!
Way to go, Devious!  That must've been a serious thrill
very nice fish!
nice ski
really nice fish there!!
nice ski and yer smile sais it all
